page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: {Hill Cottage Farm.}The farm has 220 acres. The farmer's main business is beef cattle though hay, broad beans, sweet corn and sprouts are grown too. The public can 'pick and pay'.{ {Lady Place Farm.}This farm is currently leased to a Cobham farmer by Burhill Estates. He uses the farm as a nursery for Friesian cattle. Once reared these cows are sent to his main farm at Cobham. {Roundbridge Farm}This is an arable farm growing barley, wheat and broad beans. There are a few cattle fed with broad beans and rye. The farm is in partnership with another farm on the Burhill Estates. {Church Farm.}This farm originally built in 1850 used to breed shire horses. The house is now a private dwelling. The owner breeds and shows deer hounds.
